item.title: YOU DON'T NEED A COMPUTER TO BE A HACKER
item.description: One susccessful and exorbitantly insufferable bugging later, I have been brutally coerced into writing a thing I wanted to write. Thank you. Please accept everything is a draft. It helps to get it DONE. Also, since there is no editing stage, the thing will stay under construction indefinitely. Sorry for the inconvenience. Please read slowly as you pass the construction site. Guestbook soon for anonymous cyberbuggying.

item.title: New stuff and new style!
item.description: I've decided to upload some older/newer/it's complicated portraits of the main guy. Go checkem, if they're there I'm proud of them. PS.: I have been bugged regarding a piece of writing (someone cares yay). Expect one this weekend. Kiss kiss; mwah;

item.title: Hey man what's up wanna hang out anytime soon
item.description: Yeah sure just wait a year or so I have a lot going on my mind lately

item.title: New month, new me
item.description: I promise I will do more rss updates. Getting into the rhythm ooh aah

item.title: New garbage on garbage
item.description: Garbage in, garbage out. More thoughts on garbage in the forest going garbage. out. of the forest.

item.description: RSS tested with success and fully. Welcome aboard.
